remarks: The meet of equivalence classes under the fineness relation-part two. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fnemeet2 $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ A. y e. S X = U. y ) -> ( T Fne ( ~P X i^i |^|_ t e. S ( topGen ` t ) ) <-> ( X = U. T /\ A. x e. S T Fne x ) ) ) $.
$d S t x y $.
$d T t x $.
$d V t x $.
$d X t x y $.
$d t y $.
